Title: Sora Help System
Description: Aimed at providing an uniform way of accessing and displaying help content from any wpf based application
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Aimed at providing an uniform way of accessing and displaying help content from any wpf based application

With Sora Help System, you have access to a Help File Editor allowing you to write your help content and then a Help Viewer. You can also display help content directly in your application by adding the HelpContentViewer control from Sora.HelpSystem.UI.WPF.dll.



For more informations about the release, please visit :
Authoring help file for WPF using Word 2007-2010 (Codeproject)
